page.title: 02HOUSING IN 04000204.
page.content: Houses in the block are mostly 2 storey and built of bricks or local stone. There are a lot of large, detached farmhouses. Their gardens are big and usually have a fence or hedge surrounding them. Most houses have either a single or double garage. They have a sitting room, dining room, kitchen, bathroom and at least 2 bedrooms. Most houses have central heating fuelled by gas or electricity. In the kitchen there is usually a gas or electric cooker. The people who live in the block would probably not work in their villages unless they lived on a farm. They are more likely to drive to Cheltenham,Gloucester,Cirencester or Swindon.
